mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board2(num, title, contents, author) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{author})
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, cnt FROM board2 b left join (SELECT bnum,COUNT(*) cnt FROM attach GROUP BY bnum) a on b.num=a.bnum ORDER BY num desc
SELECT * FROM BOARD2 b INNER JOIN ATTACH a ON b.num = a.bnum WHERE b.num = #{num}
